title: v1.58.0 crashes android app
body:
When using https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp.Views/1.58.0 and https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp/1.58.0.  Attempting to add a new `SKCanvasView` to a *.axml file, my app crashes as soon as I load the view containing this code:

```
<SkiaSharp.Views.Android.SKCanvasView
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:id="@+id/sKCanvasView1" />
```

- I'm targeting  a minimum android version of 4.0.3
- Downgrading to SkiaSharp 1.57.1 fixes the issue.
- The crash occurs on the emulator (x86 Android 6.0 API 23) and a Pixel phone (Android 7.1 API 25)

I pulled this from logcat:
